dialog.text: Tried doing some easy problems on HackerRank - stuck again already.  How's you?
Its all so mathsy - what's this got to do with programming stuff?  I thought I was going to be writing games and mobile apps.  How's your project going this week?

joins.text: Well, at least one of us is getting on ok.
Yeah, it's not going great for me as well.

dialog.text: Pete totally annoyed me last night.  He came home, saw I was studying and then just walked out again - I just went to bed and did not hear him come in but I could tell he'd been drinking.  Not looking forward to seeing him tonight!  See you Monday!
